1.title: The Lost River Treasure of Pensacola
1.plot: Ashlan and Philippe Cousteau head to Pensacola, Florida, to track down a Native American legend of pirates and lost treasure. The investigation becomes a fight for survival when their mission takes them to the dark and dangerous Escambia River.

3.title: Mystery Wreck of Puerto Rico
3.plot: Ashlan and Philippe Cousteau head to Puerto Rico to unlock the mystery of pirate Prince Maurice and his lost ship, The Defiance. Recent hurricanes on the island may have uncovered clues to the whereabouts of the 400-year-old shipwreck.

4.title: The Ghost Ship of St. Thomas
4.plot: Philippe and Ashlan Cousteau return to the US Virgin Islands to investigate what happened to the RMS Derwent, a 19th-century paddle wheeler that vanished without a trace. Recent hurricanes have revealed clues to the boat's whereabouts.

5.title: Fact of Fiction?: The Search for Gasparilla
5.plot: The Cousteaus head to the gulf coast of Florida to investigate the legend of the infamous pirate Gasparilla and reports of a local resident who claimed to have sailed with him. The mission is put in jeopardy when Ashlan suffers a serious injury.

6.title: Dead Man's Island: Blood and Treasure
6.plot: Philippe and Ashlan head to Ecuador, where they risk angry seas and modern-day pirates to investigate pirate Bartholomew Sharp who is reputed to have attacked a ship in the waters surrounding Dead Man's Island and killed 300 men.

7.title: The Lost Ship of Peru's Pirate Hunters
7.plot: Philippe and Ashlan Cousteau team up with the Peruvian Navy to investigate a 17th-century disaster that still haunts the country and its people.

8.title: The Wreck of the Roanoke: A Civil War Mystery
8.plot: Ashlan and Philippe Cousteau head to Bermuda to help solve the mystery the Roanoke, a Civil War-era gun runner that was taken over by pirates. In more than 150 years, no one has been able to find the doomed vessel and its mysterious cargo.

1.title: St. Thomas: The Greatest Pirate Story Never Told
1.plot: Philippe and Ashlan Cousteau head to St. Thomas to learn more about Jean Hamlin, a sadistic pirate who may have left a vast fortune on the sea floor. Their investigation uncovers a secret society of divers who lead them to a shocking discovery.

2.title: Ship Sinker: Lighthouse Reef in Belize
2.plot: Philippe and Ashlan visit Belize to explore the Great Blue Hole, a stunning wonder of the world. They then head to a private island to investigate a modern-day treasure map that could reveal hidden clues to the area's pirate past.

3.title: Antigua: The Lost Treasure of the Pirate Prince
3.plot: Our intrepid pair arrive in Antigua to track down new rumors about pirate Prince Rupert's missing treasure. They follow their investigation across the island into dangerous waters that reveal a clue that may change history.

4.title: Lost in Texas: Spanish Galleons of 1554
4.plot: We are in Texas where Ashlan and Philippe join with local experts in the hunt for clues about a missing treasure from 1554 on South Padre Island. Their mission takes them from dangerous waters to lethal quicksand in search of answers.

5.title: Silverbank: The Unsolved Cousteau Wreck
5.plot: Philippe and Ashlan journey to the Caribbean to one of the world's deadliest reefs to complete a mission that Philippe's grandfather was unable to.

6.title: The Buzzard's Lost Booty in St. Croix
6.plot: Ashlan and Philippe arrive in St. Croix to investigate the scenic island's rich pirate history and its link to the lost treasure of an infamous pirate known as "The Buzzard."

7.title: The Real Treasure Island
7.plot: Our pair head to the British Virgin Islands to investigate the story behind Robert Louis Stevenson's famous novel. Their dangerous mission uncovers clues on land and beneath the waves.

8.title: Calico Jack
8.plot: Philippe and Ashlan Cousteau uncover new leads in the search for pirate Calico Jack's missing treasure that could be worth millions.

9.title: Roatan's Lost Pirate Treasure
9.plot: The pair head to Roatan, Honduras, to investigate rumors of a lost chest of gold still missing on the island; moments of incredible beauty and harrowing danger.

10.title: The Lost Treasure of Amelia Island
10.plot: Philippe and Ashlan are off to Florida this time. They head to Amelia Island to investigate one of the most famous stories of sunken treasures ever -- the lost 1715 Silver Fleet.

11.title: The Robin Hood of Pirates
11.plot: Ashlan and Philippe Cousteau go to South Florida to meet with a family who say they have a map to billions in lost gold. Their investigation ends with a mysterious finding in a swamp.

12.title: Smuggler's Booty in the Dominican Republic
12.plot: The pair head to Puerto Plata in the Dominican Republic to unravel a mysterious shipwreck that might have treasure on board.

13.title: The Treasure Caves of Dominica
13.plot: Philippe and Ashlan go to Dominica, a remote island where a Spanish treasure convoy wrecked with millions in treasure. Their investigation reveals clues about whether the treasure was salvaged by local tribes or remains undiscovered.

imdb.title: Caribbean Pirate Treasure
plot: Philippe Cousteau Jr, grandson of famous explorer Jacques Cousteau, and his wife, journalist Ashlan Gorse Cousteau, travel the Caribbean exploring pirate legends, investigating shipwrecks and the lore of lost treasure.
